name: Forus
public_notice:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract - which allows contract owners to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Forus is a community-based token and platform with a voting system. 

Token is based on three key principles: work together to create value for others; be open and welcoming to participants in your project.

Forus Platform is an exchange platform which is focusing to solve two major issues, the first is scalability issues, and the other involves low liquidity in cryptocurrency markets due to high volatility or unpredictable price movements.
